statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id, action ORDER BY user_id ASC, COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY action HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY MAX(timestamp) DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, username, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT column_name, old_value, new_value FROM data_modifications WHERE modification_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'johndoe' AND action = 'login';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_modifications WHERE table_name = 'users';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY action ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT table_name, column_name, old_value, new_value FROM data_modifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, username, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) AND action = 'delete' ORDER BY id;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM data_modification_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, access_type FROM data_access_logs ORDER BY user_id ASC, access_type DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, user_id, access_type FROM data_access_logs WHERE data_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_modification_logs WHERE user_id = 3 AND modified_data_id = 200;
SELECT id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM data_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, action, user_id FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'login';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM data_protection_regulations WHERE regulation_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, modification_type FROM user_modification_logs WHERE affected_rows > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT table_name, COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY table_name;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_actions FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, table_name FROM user_modification_logs WHERE modification_type = 'update' AND affected_rows > 50 ORDER BY user_id, table_name;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM data_protection_regulations WHERE regulation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action, description FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id, action FROM data_modification_logs WHERE operation = 'UPDATE';
SELECT log_id, user_id, data_source, encryption_key FROM data_protection_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_logs WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT log_id, description FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM data_modification_logs WHERE operation = 'UPDATE' AND table_name = 'customers' ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_logs WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' AND regulation_name LIKE '%GDPR%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
